title: 820-3209-a
message:
3Beeps. Had some corrosion on C6100, R5023 and C3890 replced then and resoldered the J9000 which also was with a bit of corrosion. Measured all voltages for the Ram looking good stable, but still the same when powered on. Any advice please?

Thanks

title: 820-3209-a
message:
RAM or CPU issue.
Could be broken solders underneath BGA chips, or bad traces.
You can try to reflow RAM chips, but not to much hope...

title: 820-3209-a
message: Yes was thinking the same thing, few times was successful with a reflow on ram but we'll see. Thanks much appreciated
